subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Barcelona played Guangzhou Evergrande in the semifinal, winning 3-0 on a Luis Suárez hat trick. But even many Barça fans probably did not take much notice.
snippet: Barcelona played Guangzhou Evergrande in the semifinal, winning 3-0 on a Luis Suárez hat trick. But even many Barça fans probably did not take much notice.
